# User Setting

## Shutter Count
View the approximate number of times the shutter has been released.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> Other actions may also increment the counter, for example turning the camera off, changing the viewfinder display selection, or choosing playback mode.

## Sound & Flash
Select **OFF** to disable the speaker, flash, illuminator, and self-timer lamp in situations in which camera sounds and lights may be unwelcome.
